ai-vv65:1.1_0: “Just as the sun shines in a moment,
ai-vv65:1.2_0: the Supreme Seer, preached the supreme Snakes,
ai-vv65:1.3_0: In just the same way, all of you,
ai-vv65:2.3_0: Whose mind is not developed like this?
ai-vv65:3.1_0: he is pleased with the god.
ai-vv65:3.3_0: asked a question, and he answered the questions.
ai-vv65:3.4_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv65:4.2_0: made of home so much bad karma.
ai-vv65:5.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
